com.github.jsonj.tools
Class JsonBuilder

java.lang.Object
  com.github.jsonj.tools.JsonBuilder

public class JsonBuilder
extends Object

Builder class for json objects. If you plan to work a lot with jsonj, you will want to import this statically, for example by adding this class to your eclipse Favorites list.
